title: Show Me It for Android Wear
summary: Show on Android Wear smile, heart, middle finger or text anyone!
developerAddress: Ukraine, Dnepropetrovskaya oblast, Krivoy Rog, 50106, 4 Zarechniy 14/29
description: Somebody frazzle you out? Do you want to smile to someone or tell him to go to hell? This app will help you. Just raise your hand straight up (as if showing middle finger), and on the screen of your Wear watch will appear the image selected. It's very simple!To get started, go to settings and check the box against the inscription â€œTurn on". Also if you wearing a watch on the right hand, check the box against the inscription "Right hand".Warning! On some Wear devices, such as LG G Watch R you should unlock the screen before use the app. (Click on the screen or bring your hand to the face)
descriptionHTML:
Somebody frazzle you out? Do you want to smile to someone or tell him to go to hell? This app will help you. Just raise your hand straight up (as if showing middle finger), and on the screen of your Wear watch will appear the image selected. It's very simple!


To get started, go to settings and check the box against the inscription “Turn on". Also if you wearing a watch on the right hand, check the box against the inscription "Right hand".


Warning! On some Wear devices, such as LG G Watch R you should unlock the screen before use the app. (Click on the screen or bring your hand to the face)
comments: 5 seconds of fun, then uninstalled.  Works and everything ðŸ˜‚ just can't imagine using it, can imagine accident getting myself in trouble. LOL
